arts.ttl: Post Match Observations: BVB Grab Huge Three Points Against Mönchengladbach
arts.sum: Niko Kovač has been in charge of this team for 16 games, and I think I can rightfully say that there have been noticeable changes in how this Dortmund team plays. Luckily, the Black and Yellows didn’t take their foot off the gas, and great, and oddly similar goals from Guirassy, Nmecha, and Svensson were enough to earn Kovač’s team the three points, even though Kevin Stöger converted a penalty around halfway through the second half.

arts.ttl: Kehl praises team, Svensson relishes "emotional" first goal for BVB
arts.sum: The BVB chief and their young Swedish full-back expressed happiness after their 3-2 defeat of Gladbach.

arts.ttl: Niko Kovač provides update on Beier's injury
arts.sum: Niko Kovač provided an update on Maxi Beier's health after a nasty collision with Gladbach's Julian Weigl.

arts.ttl: Report: Dortmund's secret purchase obligation for talented defender
arts.sum: Sky Germany report a secret purchase obligation for Dortmund and their loan player Daniel Svensson. If he reaches a certain amount of appearances for BVB, the transfer will be made permanent.

arts.ttl: Borussia Dortmund win exciting "Battle of the Borussias"
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund came from behind to beat Borussia Mönchengladbach in a five-goal thriller.

arts.ttl: Dortmund's first-half blitz secures victory over Gladbach in five-goal thriller
arts.sum: Serhou Guirassy, Felix Nmecha, and Daniel Svensson scored in a nine-minute spell before half-time to overturn an early deficit.The victory boosts Dortmund's European aspirations and sees them leapfrog Gladbach in the table. Daniel Svensson performs an acrobatic celebration after scoring Dortmund's crucial third goal.

arts.ttl: Joe Scally feels Gladbach "lacked killer instinct" in defeat to Dortmund
arts.sum: The American gave a brutally honest account of his team's efforts at the Wesfalenstadion.

arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | Borussia Dortmund 3-1 Borussia Mönchengladbach
arts.sum: Easter Sunday, and just like Jesus, Borussia Dortmund came back from the dead (this is a stretch, they were only a goal down) to beat Borussia Mönchengladbach 3-1. The game…

arts.ttl: Easter Sunday's Bundesliga predictions including Borussia Dortmund vs. Borussia Monchengladbach
arts.sum: Sports Mole provides score predictions and previews for all of today's Bundesliga fixtures, including Borussia Dortmund vs. Borussia Monchengladbach.

arts.ttl: Preview: Borussia Dortmund vs. Borussia Monchengladbach - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Bundesliga clash between Borussia Dortmund and Borussia Monchengladbach, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
